episodes.title: Waking Up While At Bethel - ExJW Story
episodes.description:
(Also check out my music video: "Cost of Doin' Business" https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HYq1eMBszWs)

In this video, I interview Jacob, a former bethelite, ministerial servant and regular pioneer. He describes growing up in a family of very devout Jehovah's Witnesses. In addition, he speaks about his time working at the Watchtower's headquarters in New York and how he woke up while "serving" at bethel.

En este video entrevisto a Jacob, un ex betelita, siervo ministerial y precursor regular. Acá él nos habla sobre crecer en una familia de testigos de Jehová muy devotos, sobre su experiencia trabajando en la sede del Watchtower en Nueva York y sobre cómo se despertó mientras "servía" en Betel.

episodes.title: Interview With Amber Scorah - Author of "Leaving the Witness"
episodes.description:
(Also check out my music video: "Cost of Doin' Business" https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HYq1eMBszWs)

In this video, I speak with Amber Scorah, a former Jehovah's Witness and regular pioneer who recently published a book entitled "Leaving the Witness: Exiting a Religion and Finding a Life." We discuss the time she spent as a Jehovah's Witness in China, platforms that have promoted her book including The Daily Show with Trevor Noah, The New York Times, NPR and The Oprah Magazine, and what she hopes to accomplish with her book.

Check out Amber's book! https://www.amazon.com/Leaving-Witness-Exiting-Religion-Finding/dp/0735222541

Amber's interview on the Daily Show with Trevor Noah http://www.cc.com/video-clips/n3mkmg/the-daily-show-with-trevor-noah-amber-scorah---traveling-out-of-a-religion-in--leaving-the-witness----extended-interview

Amber's book mentioned in the Oprah magazine https://www.oprahmag.com/life/a27758145/best-books-female-authors-2019/

Amber's interview with NPR https://www.npr.org/2019/06/05/729771739/leaving-the-witness-the-end-of-the-world-as-she-knew-it-upon-losing-her-religion

Amber's "Believer" article https://believermag.com/leaving-the-witness/

Amber's article in the New York Times https://www.nytimes.com/2019/05/31/opinion/sunday/life-after-death.html

episodes.title: Conversation With Barbara Anderson
episodes.description:
(Also check out my music video: "Cost of Doin' Business" https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HYq1eMBszWs)

In this video, I speak with Barbara Anderson, a former Jehovah's Witness of over 40 years, a former volunteer worker at the Watchtower headquarters, and one of the main reasons that the public at large found out about a huge problem with the JW organization. She has appeared on Dateline NBC, A&E: Cults & Extreme Beliefs and a host of other programs. In this video, Barbara shares some fascinating experiences that she had while working with the writing department at the Watchtower's headquarters, communications that she had with Governing Body members, and details regarding her current efforts to eradicate harmful practices within the organization.

episodes.title: Conversation With Sociologist & Cult Specialist Dr. Janja Lalich, Ph.D. (Subtítulos en español)
episodes.description:
(Also check out my music video: "Cost of Doin' Business" https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HYq1eMBszWs)

Meet Dr. Janja Lalich, Ph.D., a sociologist, cult specialist, author, researcher, and retired professor who has spent years studying high-control groups including the Jehovah's Witnesses. Dr. Lalich is also herself a former cult member. In this video, we discuss her professional background, the 10+ years that she spent as a member of a cult, the effect that these groups have on children and why it is so difficult to escape.

episodes.title: Growing Up As A JW: Interview With Former Pioneer (Subtítulos en español)
episodes.description:
(Also check out my music video: "Cost of Doin' Business" https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HYq1eMBszWs)

In this video, I speak with Alisha Joseph, a former Jehovah's Witness and Pioneer, about her upbringing as one of Jehovah's Witnesses. She discusses the challenges that she and many JW children have faced, the difficulties of being a JW adolscent, and her eventual departure from the religion.

Desafortunadamente, todavia no he podido hacer los subtítulos en español para este video. Los voy a poner mas adelante. Por mientras, vean mi canal ExJW Fifth para mirar todos los otros videos que tengo en español o con subtítulos en español.

episodes.title: Interview With Former Watchtower Writer & Researcher (subtítulos en español)
episodes.description:
(Also check out my music video: "Cost of Doin' Business" https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HYq1eMBszWs)

On this episode, I speak with Ben who is a former JW elder, regular pioneer, convention speaker, and Watchtower and Awake! magazine writer and researcher for the Watchtower organization. He explains his history in the religion, some incredible insights into how the religion's magazine articles are written, and what led to his departure.

Ben's email: fusion.photography@mac.com

ENTREVISTA CON UN EX-REDACTOR Y INVESTIGADOR PARA LA SOCIEDAD WATCHTOWER

En este episodio, hablo con Ben que era testigo de Jehová, anciano, y precursor regular que también daba discursos en las asambleas regionales (de distrito). Además, era redactor y investigador de las revistas Atalaya y Despertad! para la sociedad Watchtower. Él explica su historia dentro de la religión, detalles sobre la manera en que se escriben los artículos de las revistas, y el motivo por lo que él dejó a la religión.

Además de este, los siguientes videos míos ya tienen subtítulos en español:

episodes.title: The Fight for an Education: Interview with Former Regular Pioneer
episodes.description:
(Also check out my music video: "Cost of Doin' Business" https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HYq1eMBszWs)

In this video, I speak with Aida, a former JW and regular pioneer. She explains her background with Jehovah's Witnesses, her fight for an education, and her eventual departure from the organization.

episodes.title: Interview With Former Elder from Brazil
episodes.description:
(Also check out my music video: "Cost of Doin' Business" https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HYq1eMBszWs)

In this interview, I speak with Marcus, a former JW elder from Brazil. He shares his history with Jehovah's Witnesses, how deeply he and his family were involved in the religion, and how he ultimately decided that he could no longer in good conscience remain a member.

Marcus' YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC02vNS8XJqPqC_CmbpigQrQ

episodes.title: Interview With Jason Wynne - Founder of AvoidJW.org
episodes.description:
(Also check out my music video: "Cost of Doin' Business" https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HYq1eMBszWs)

Jason Wynne, the founder of avoidjw.org in one of his very first public appearances speaks about his background with Jehovah's Witnesses, his departure and the website that he founded.

episodes.title: Interview:  Former Bethelite (During 1975) (Subtítulos en español)
episodes.description:
(Also check out my music video: "Cost of Doin' Business" https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HYq1eMBszWs)

In this episode I sit down with Joy, a former bethelite, regular pioneer, "need-greater" and elder's wife. She describes bethel before and after the failure of the 1975 prophecy, how she became disillusioned with the organization and what eventually led to her split with the religion. 

(En este episodio, hablé con Joy, una ex-betelita, precursora regular que servía donde había “más necesidad”, y esposa de un anciano. Me dijo como era betel antes y después del incumplimiento de la profecía de 1975, como la organización la decepcionó y por que ella - con el tiempo- se salió de la religión.)

Joy's Recommended Reading List:

Crisis of Conscience - Ray Franz
In Search of Christian Freedom - Ray Franz
Gentile Times Revisited - Carl Olof Johnson
Living in the Last Days? - Carl Olof Johnson
Apocalypse Delayed - James Penton
A Road Less Traveled - M. Scott Peck, M.D.
Further Along a Road Less Traveled - M. Scott Peck, M.D.
People of the Lie - M. Scott Peck, M.D.
Combatting Cult Mind Control - Steven Hassan
True Believer - Eric Hoffer
The Myth of Certainty - Daniel Taylor
The History of God - Karen Armstrong

Fictional Books:

The Red Tent
The Celestine Prophecy
Illusions



Instagram: @exjwfifth
Patreon: patreon.com/exjwfifth

episodes.title: Interview With Former Elder Featured on Reveal News
episodes.description:
(Also check out my music video: "Cost of Doin' Business" https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HYq1eMBszWs)

Roger was a Jehovah's Witness Elder for about 30 years. He was recently disfellowshipped for giving a deposition in opposition to the Watchtower. He has appeared on Reveal News with Trey Bundy regarding a very high profile child abuse case within the organization

episodes.title: Interview with founder of JWStruggle (former pioneer, bethelite and elder)
episodes.description:
In this video, I interview Eric, the founder of JWStruggle and a former pioneer, bethelite, and elder. Eric discusses his history with the witnesses, the responsibilites that he had within the organization, and how he came to the conclusion that the Jehovah's Witness religion was not the truth.

episodes.title: My EX JW story (bethelite, pioneer, MS, foreign language)
episodes.description:
(Also check out my music video: "Cost of Doin' Business" https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HYq1eMBszWs)

I was a very active Jehovah's Witness my whole life. Baptized at 9, former pioneer, ministerial servant, bethelite, and served in two foreign languages before I discovered the truth about the truth earlier this year. I am now being shunned essentially by everyone I've ever known
